title: My league won't Open ( Mac )
body:
Recent I opened my mac, and as I opened it (from sleep mode) the league patcher popped up because there was an update for league. So I followed through with his update. At one point the update got stuck so I decided to just press the casual "x" on the top. As followed my league would no longer open. I decided to redownloaded it and now whenever the old launcher comes up I press the big yellow button saying "LAUCH" and the launcher goes away and the game doesn't start up.

Ive tried deleting the launcher and patcher files. Ive tried quite a lot of things , but honestly if you have any suggestion i would greatly appreciated it . 


thanks

replies.body:
I found a fix for my mac= finder>applications>LOL>right click show-package contents>MacOS>RiotMacContainer

Close app then reopen

There is no folder titled MacOs when I show package contents, only a folder that says Contents. Clicking on this then gives me an option to show package contents of League again, which then shows MacOs, but there is nothing called RiotMacContainer.

Help!!
Click on Contents and then click on MacOS, that's where you'll find the RiotMacContainer
i open contents and there is no mac OS
You are my HERO, I was getting frantic thinking I needed to re-install the client and this WORKS LIKE A CHARM! <3 {{champion:103}}

Hey Rito, this seems to be the fix to a lot of mac login glitches. How about you fix the code to this glitch or at least make the manual fix known. I've had to redownload the client multiple times because of mac login glitches and I think this guy finally found the fix and it's not even that hard to do. Show your mac players some love.

Hold on, I'm a little confused: I found the file RiotMacContainer, closed my client, launched the file which did some weird thing in Terminal, and then opened the app again, only to have the same result of my client not launching. Anyone having a similar issue?
Worked flawlessly. Thanks fam!
Thank you, worked a charm!
Dude You are AWESOME. This works. {{summoner:14}}
Thanks this worked for me! Stops me from having to restart my computer every time... thanks again!
This worked for me

This can happen if your network is having a problem reaching the patching server, so it can't get you updated and on the latest version of the client.  My suggestion would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear that up.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
HELP US

As said above its not the connection issues its simply the poorly developed mac client, countless reports have been made for this exact issues and yet. Nothing big happens, I'm just a bit tilted this happens to everyone. Please just fix something.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UZP9H7TQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-18T15:54:44.524+0000)
>
> This can happen if your network is having a problem reaching the patching server, so it can't get you updated and on the latest version of the client.  My suggestion would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear that up.  Let me know if you run into any issues.

I installed LoL on my Mac yesterday and it wouldn't work... Now, it's a new mac been having it for like 4 days now and couldn't find a solution. What fixed it is the DNS servers. After reading what @Porocles said, I realized I've forgotten to use the 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 DNS servers for my connection.
To do the same do this:
Click the Apple icon in the top left > System Preferences > Network > Advanced > DNS > Where it says DNS Servers: look down a bit and locate the + icon, then add these:
8.8.8.8
8.8.4.4

7. Click Ok
8. Click Apply
9. ????
10. Profit
I'm pretty sure it's nothing to do with connection issues, it just won't open up. I click on league and it bounces on the dock for not even a second and it goes away. Fix this pleasee.
this has been a problem for over 3 days now still no fix (bump rito pls)

We've been investigating reports from some mac players who are failing to launch the patcher.  We have a[ sticky post ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2aNwwPQY-5232017-older-macs-unable-to-launch-league)on it now for further updates, and working towards resolving this as soon as we can.  In the meantime, if you are impacted we could really use your help!

If you are on a 2007 Mac or older and unable to launch League, send us your energy:

Download the hextech repair tool to obtain a set of logs.
You'll also want to submit a System Report as well.
Attach these logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

This will help us investigate further, as well as put you in touch with our tech team to help individually.  Thanks for the assist, and we'll see you there!
I have to reinstall leauge everytime i want to play. i cant open it after i log out....pls fiz it. i dont want to reinstall everytime....the patching takes years
I found a fix, the client thinks it is already open. Open activity monitor and force quit any LOL files then restart client :)
Well done, fixed. Thanks homie quan.
Worked for me as well, thank you!
Thanks man this worked for me as well. {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
you the man, thx bro{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I am also having this same issue, at first i thought it was the new client that i was forced to start using because i have a older model mac and even with the low specs it was a strain for me to run and already half the time would just freeze out. Now it just simply won't load, it doesn't freeze its just not responding and have identical issue with the other videos posted in the comments. Still very annoyed and irritated at this situation but relieved I'm not the only one with this problem and that its not me, my computer or connection and that this is on riots end, please help up riot.

For the past few weeks, every time I double click on the client after my computer was in sleep mode the icon bounces in my dock, but never proceeds past just flashing the logo for a split second on my screen. Then I have to force quit the client because it says it is not responding. The only way I can get league to open is by restarting my mac and opening up league afterward. Crossing my fingers for a fix!
some thing happens to me https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBFc1dg7ARM
same prob here

Bump. 

This is my first time commenting I think. I'm using a MacBook Pro I got for my birthday about a week ago. When I press league, the icon bounces like twice and then it stops. It isn't connection issues because my connection is perfectly fine.

Edit: I fixed it by redownloading. It didn't work at first, but I kept on pressing the icon.

I have same problem, if i restart my computer it works again.... but never works permanently. when I go to look to the package contents. I feel like there is a lot of folders missing like the system folder in RADS, and other folders I recognized before some latest update.
I have the same problem...

My client won't also open up and when I do show package content. The league client Ux has a pen and paper and the symbol that is a circle and with a line through it. What am I supposed to do now? Riot please help!

So I just reinstall league and now every time I press launch and I go to the activity monitor and I see the new league client icon in there but then it got terminated, can anyone help me, please? 
[file:///Users/mac/Desktop/Screen%20Shot%202017-05-22%20at%207.17.20%20PM.png](http://file:///Users/mac/Desktop/Screen%20shot%202017-05-22%20at%207.17.20%20PM.png)
Same here!

Same problem here. My launcher opens up fine however, when i press launch, the launcher disappears like normal but no login screen appears. Activity monitor shows the launcher is working fine and never says the program isn't responding, it just disappears off activity monitor when i press launch and nothing replaces it. There is no error message either.

For me this started right after the last patch as well. I think the problem is in the patch. I don't think it is to do with the force update to the new client as my league was working fine before the last patch when this was added.
My problem was associated to a "lockfile" sticking around. Once I deleted this lockfile I was able to load the game properly.
Lmao rito still can't fix this problem i suppose, so sad
there is no RiotMacContainer
Having the same problem. I've tried reinstalling, restarting the computer, toying with files and nothing has worked I still can't get past the client launcher:/
Same thing here... I feel like i've tried everything... I think that maybe its a divine power telling me to quit the game...
I had the same exact thought. Might be a good time to focus on my music and art lmaoooo rip my league life.{{summoner:6}}
I'm having the exact same problem. I can't believe riot still hasn't done shit.
nothing and to mee! It doesn't say anywhere RiotMacContainer       {{champion:141}}          {{item:3124}}         :(

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/IwIEcljO-league-wont-open-2017

This worked for me!!!!!!!
After I deleted the lockfile, I couldn't click on the LeagueClient, but deleting the lock file and clicking on the app worked for me
same issue here R.I.P mac users
League of legends no longer supports mac lion 10.7.5 and below btw. That may be the problem. if so update to Mountain Lion 10.8.5, it costs $20. (I also had the same problem.)

......................
same issues 

still failing to launch the patcher.

can't play -.-when would you fix{{summoner:14}}
So did riot pretty much say screw mac users? People are still waiting on a solution for a fix and still nothing. Could we get some assistance here please?
